name: CodenameChomper
description:
Skip ahead to tech-rehearsal day one, Friday, March 10th,  where I noticed one of our characters (spoiler alert) makes their first entrance riding a scooter.  There it is; immediately recalling a classic favorite of mine from childhood, "Skate or Die II," you moved on a skateboard collecting items through the level.  As I expressed this idea to my fellow technicians who pointed out (pretty sure it was Prince), "Oh like how you collect "SKATE" in Tony Hawk Pro Skater?" That magical connection confirmed the thought,  this was totally it. I got to work...

Click to view the prototype - Mar 12, 2023
